code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant user
    participant browser
    participant serves

    user->>browser: Type note and click Save
    Note right of browser: Browser captures form data and sends it to the server

    browser->>server: POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    activate server
    server-->>browser: Redirect to /exampleapp/notes
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: Browser follows the redirect and reloads the page

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/notes
    activate server
    server-->>browser: HTML document
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the css file
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.js
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser starts executing the JavaScript code that fetches the JSON from the server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [Retail_CouponSystem}, ... ]
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function that renders the notes

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Type note and click Save是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/notes、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json完成整个流程。
